issues.title: ZeroBlog feed bot
issues.body:
Hello,

i read your post in http://127.0.0.1:43110/142jqssVAj2iRxMACJg2dzipB5oicZYz5w/?Topic:1516747933_1AnFGL613gYqFWm4Lhwdk6x5gCRe1tPFxE

but i can not find the zeroblog bot script in your repo. Please update your post to contain direct link if possible.
Anyway your solution covers very small amount of clearnet content. My proposed solution of processing any mysql database covers most of the clearnet content.

I also was sending a message to you via http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1AbRRDveQD5EFtmXxBqQfS1guUWXxytMJZ/1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS/1518271508 but seen no reaction.

Thank You,
S.
